manage.inputDateHelp: The day which the event will be running on.
manage.inputUsers: Playing With (press enter after each name) [Optional]
manage.inputDescHelp: Note: These are not currently displayed on MixPlay. This will be a future addition.
manage.inputPlatform: Platform(s) in which the event is taking place.
manage.inputBackgroundUriHelp: This needs to be the full path to the image to use for the background. If not filled, we'll use the background for the game selected.
